description: WDF files are typically found in the %windir%\​system32\​drivers directory. Examples of WDF files include MsftWdf_user_01_09_00.Wdf , MsftWdf_Kernel_01009_Coinstaller_Critical.Wdf , and Msft_Kernel_WdfRamdisk_01009.Wdf .
The Windows Driver Foundation (WDF) is a conceptual driver model that includes the KMDF and UMDF Windows components, as well as driver verification tools.
